name: Coral Corral
description:
In Coral Corral, look after your own undersea garden at you own pace. 

  • Buy and Grow Coral of various colours!
  • Harvest said Coral for Coral Dust to earn money!
  • Buy Aquatic Pets to help you out and grow your garden!
  • Relax to the relaxing soundtrack as your pets and garden thrive.
  • Beware of the Parrotfish and Sea Snail! (Or don't.)
  • Expand your garden!
  • Enjoy other (less relaxing) songs!
  • Find secrets

We hope you enjoy your stay at Coral Corral!

Enjoy the music? You can find the soundtrack here!
